EmailExpiredPage.title: Email verification link expired
EmailExpiredPage.desc: Looks like the verification link has expired. Not to worry, we can send the link again

ForgotPasswordPage.title: Forgot Password
ForgotPasswordPage.desc: Enter your email address and we will send you further instructions
ForgotPasswordPage.descAfterSend: The link has been sent by email. If you don’t receive an email send link again
ForgotPasswordPage.modal: We have sent a link to confirm your email to

MergerOfAccountsPage.title: Merger of Accounts
MergerOfAccountsPage.descAfter: is already in the system. Could we merge this accounts?

VerificationInvalidPage.title: Email verification link invalid
VerificationInvalidPage.desc: Looks like the verification link has expired. Not to worry, we can send the link again

RecoveryPage.title: Create New Password
RecoveryPage.desc: Your password must be between 6 and 20 characters

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: Please double-check the browser address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.
